story_galar_02_13000/2401_1101_0100_20:
This match has been a roller coaster so far! And
now, it’s time for the final battle!
story_galar_02_13000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We, Team Magma, hold the development of
humanity as our ideal.
story_galar_02_13000/2401_1001_0400_10: For this reason, we decided to support Mr. Rose.
story_galar_02_13000/2401_1001_0500_10: I hope you don’t hold it against me.
story_galar_02_13000/2401_1001_0600_10: Mr. Rose’s research really drew my interest!
story_galar_02_13000/2401_1001_0700_10:
As a researcher myself, I’ve had the pleasure of
supporting him as well!
story_galar_02_13000/2401_1001_0800_10: Please don’t take it the wrong way.
